title: Pride - the saddle horse. - 2nd ed.
brief_description: Junior social studies film showing various rules of the horse in modern life and tracing the developments and training of a colt until he becomes a prize saddle horse at three years of age. Depicts stages of colt’s growth, early life with mother, first shoeing, training for stance, breaking to the saddle, learning the gaits, and performing at a horse show.
